label: 聖語蔵
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 57th  . Nara National Museum . 2005
説明文: Originally, the Shōgozō was the sutra repository for the Tōdaiji sub-temple Sonshō-in. The building and its contents were moved onto the grounds of the Shōsō-in in 1894. It holds a wealth of valuable Buddhist scriptures that have a slightly different character than the rest of the Shōsō-in treasures. [東大寺、尊勝院、正倉院]
